entry.data:
CLEAR
PATCHY FOG AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
CALM WINDS

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 40
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTHEAST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
